document.full_text: boston bruins top scorer patrice bergeron suffered a concussion from an open-ice hit during his team's series-clinching game against the philadelphia flyers, the team said on saturday.
document.title: bruins lose top scorer bergeron to concussion
lines_and_colors: boston bruins top scorer patrice bergeron suffered a concussion from an open-ice hit during his team's series-clinching game against the philadelphia flyers, the team said on saturday.
